results.raw_content:
Sensata Technologies: Pioneering GreenTech and AI Solutions at CES 2024
Sensata Technologies, a leading global provider of sensors and controls, turned heads at the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) 2024 with their innovative approach to electrification. The company showcased its commitment to GreenTech, Artificial Intelligence (AI), and sustainability, emphasizing the importance of industry-wide collaboration to drive progress in electrification. This article offers an in-depth view of Sensata’s participation at CES 2024, focusing on the company’s key innovations and commitment to sustainable technology.
A Focus on GreenTech, AI, and Sustainability
At CES 2024, Sensata Technologies demonstrated a clear focus on GreenTech, AI, and sustainability. The company emphasized the necessity for industry-wide collaboration to navigate the full electrification ecosystem, reflecting a dedication to advancing environmentally friendly technology. With a keen eye on the future, Sensata views these elements as essential components of the technological evolution and a route towards a more sustainable and efficient world.
Sensata Technologies’ Innovative Approach
Sensata’s innovative approach was evident in the range of new sensor technologies they unveiled for automotive, industrial, and aerospace applications. The company’s advanced sensing and control solutions stole the show, proving their commitment to innovation and energy efficiency. These groundbreaking technologies are designed to help customers improve safety, efficiency, emissions, and comfort across a wide range of applications.
Collaboration and Customization
Collaboration and customization were the buzzwords at Sensata’s CES 2024 showcase. The company emphasized the importance of working together with other industry players to drive progress in electrification and deliver tailored solutions that meet specific customer needs. This collaborative approach can accelerate the pace of technological advancements and bring about a more sustainable future.
A Commitment to Sustainability
Sensata Technologies’ commitment to sustainability was a focal point at CES 2024. The company demonstrated its dedication to environmental responsibility through the development of energy-efficient products. By integrating GreenTech and AI, Sensata is not only aiming to reduce its carbon footprint but also helping its clients achieve their sustainability goals.
Conclusion
In conclusion, Sensata Technologies made a significant impact at CES 2024, showcasing their commitment to navigating the full electrification ecosystem. The company’s focus on GreenTech, AI, and sustainability, coupled with their drive for collaboration and customization, set a high standard for technological innovation. As we move towards a more connected and sustainable future, Sensata Technologies is clearly at the forefront of this transformation.

results.title: Sensata To Unveil New Electrification Initiative at CES 2024
results.raw_content:
Check to see if product is in stock:
Main navigation
Sensata To Unveil New Electrification Initiative at CES 2024
SWINDON, United Kingdom, November 29, 2023 - Sensata Technologies (NYSE: ST), a global industrial technology company and leading provider of sensors, sensor-rich solutions and electrical protection devices used in mission-critical systems that create valuable business insights for customers, will showcase innovative technologies and a portfolio of impactful new products that are helping lead the world’s transformation to electrification at the upcoming 2024 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, January 9-12.
“CES is known as the largest and most powerful tech event in the world, so it’s the ideal platform for us to demonstrate our role as a driving force toward an electrified world,” said Jennifer Slater, Senior Vice President, Automotive at Sensata. “We look forward to meeting with both existing and new customers as we demonstrate how we leverage our proven expertise, technological differentiation and reliability to best support them on their electrification journeys.”
With a rich history of innovation and building trust with customers, Sensata has helped solve mission-critical sensing and electrical protection engineering challenges for over a century. Today, Sensata enables customers to address markets responsible for 66% of greenhouse gas emissions, providing solutions to safely deliver a cleaner, more efficient and electrified and connected world.
Sensata Technologies invites attendees, media representatives, and industry partners to explore the exhibit at CES, booth 9653. Visitors to the booth can expect a firsthand look at the latest advancements in electrification technology, demonstrating the company’s dedication to shaping the future of clean energy.
A team of experts will be available to answer any questions across the broad portfolio of electrification products. Additional information on products being showcased can be previewed or meetings scheduled in advance or any time during the show by visiting https://www.sensata.com/ces-2024.
“Electrification is transforming markets and opportunities at an accelerating pace,” explained Brian Wilkie, Senior VP of Sensing Solutions at Sensata.  “At Sensata, we’ve always taken on the most difficult problems in the most critical environments. “Now, we look forward to sharing how we will impact the entire electrification ecosystem.”
Visit Sensata Technologies at booth 9653 at CES 2024 from January 9-12 in Las Vegas, NV to learn more about their electrified and connected portfolio.
About Sensata Technologies
Sensata Technologies is a global industrial technology company striving to create a cleaner, more efficient, electrified and connected world. Through its broad portfolio of sensors, electrical protection components and sensor-rich solutions which create valuable business insights, Sensata helps its customers address increasingly complex engineering and operating performance requirements. With more than 21,000 employees and global operations in 16 countries, Sensata serves customers in the automotive, heavy vehicle & off-road, industrial, and aerospace markets. Learn more at www.sensata.com and follow Sensata on LinkedIn, Facebook, Twitter, and Instagram.

Main navigation
Sensata Electrification
We're the driving force toward an electrified world and a sustainable future.
At Sensata, we’re helping to lead the electrification transformation across everything from passenger cars to heavy trucks. Industrial infrastructure to the power grid. It’s a transformation that’s accelerating every day. Along with the impact on markets and opportunities.
With the expertise and scale to drive the adoption of new technologies as well as the agility to respond to new challenges, we’re helping our partners succeed. And we’re helping make this new electrified world more efficient, more connected, cleaner and safer.
Navigating the Full Electrification Ecosystem
More collaboration. More innovation. More customization.
We offer components and solutions across the complete electrification ecosystem. Bringing the innovation, expertise, and scale that empowers our partners to reach their goals. Because the drive toward a cleaner, more sustainable planet benefits us, our partners, and the world at large.
e-Mobility
With a broad presence around the world, we can supply our global partners with the same product within their manufacturing region and avoid potential supply chain disruptions.
Learn more >
Renewable Energy
We’re driving the speed of innovation with power conversion systems and key components for renewable energy and hydrogen applications.
Learn more >
Infrastructure
Driven by innovation, we are the industry leaders in high-voltage components for fast-charging infrastructure. The market experiences consistent annual growth in all major regions, and our recent strategic investments in power conversion underscore our commitment to staying ahead.
Learn more >
Industrial Electrification
An electrified world means more than vehicles and charging stations. We’re leading the market in the electrification of buildings with our HVAC and heat pump innovation. We’re also on the cutting-edge of material handling battery and controls solutions.
Learn more >
Building Strong Partnerships.
Inspiring Innovative Solutions.
Collaboration
Through open dialogue and shared knowledge, we’re able to become an extension of your engineering team and deliver innovative tailored solutions and superior value.
Experience & Expertise
With our deep bench of world-wide engineering talent, we’ve built a reputation as an early innovator and a global leader in delivering difficult, mission-critical solutions.
Global Capabilities
With a broad presence around the world, we can supply our global platforms with the same product within the manufacturing region and avoid potential supply chain disruptions.
Making Electrification Headlines
Let's start a conversation.
Footer

Sensata to Unveil New Electrification Initiative at CES 2024
SWINDON, England, November 29, 2023--(BUSINESS WIRE)--Sensata Technologies (NYSE: ST), a global industrial technology company and leading provider of sensors, sensor-rich solutions and electrical protection devices used in mission-critical systems that create valuable business insights for customers, will showcase innovative technologies and a portfolio of impactful new products that are helping lead the world’s transformation to electrification at the upcoming 2024 Consumer Electronics Show in Las Vegas, January 9-12.
"CES is known as the largest and most powerful tech event in the world, so it’s the ideal platform for us to demonstrate our role as a driving force toward an electrified world," said Jennifer Slater, Senior Vice President, Automotive at Sensata. "We look forward to meeting with both existing and new customers as we demonstrate how we leverage our proven expertise, technological differentiation and reliability to best support them on their electrification journeys."
With a rich history of innovation and building trust with customers, Sensata has helped solve mission-critical sensing and electrical protection engineering challenges for over a century. Today, Sensata enables customers to address markets responsible for 66% of greenhouse gas emissions, providing solutions to safely deliver a cleaner, more efficient and electrified and connected world.
Sensata Technologies invites attendees, media representatives, and industry partners to explore the exhibit at CES, booth 9653. Visitors to the booth can expect a firsthand look at the latest advancements in electrification technology, demonstrating the company’s dedication to shaping the future of clean energy.
A team of experts will be available to answer any questions across the broad portfolio of electrification products. Additional information on products being showcased can be previewed or meetings scheduled in advance or any time during the show by visiting https://sensatadev.prod.acquia-sites.com/ces-2024.
"Electrification is transforming markets and opportunities at an accelerating pace," explained Brian Wilkie, Senior VP of Sensing Solutions at Sensata. "At Sensata, we’ve always taken on the most difficult problems in the most critical environments. Now, we look forward to sharing how we will impact the entire electrification ecosystem."
Visit Sensata Technologies at booth 9653 at CES 2024 from January 9-12 in Las Vegas, NV to learn more about their electrified and connected portfolio.
About Sensata TechnologiesSensata Technologies is a global industrial technology company striving to create a cleaner, more efficient, electrified, and connected world. Through its broad portfolio of sensors, electrical protection components and sensor-rich solutions which create valuable business insights, Sensata helps its customers address increasingly complex engineering and operating performance requirements. With more than 21,000 employees and global operations in 16 countries, Sensata serves customers in the automotive, heavy vehicle & off-road, industrial, and aerospace markets. Learn more at www.sensata.com and follow us on LinkedIn, Facebook and Twitter.
